posts.content:
1959 Kombi For Sale

Very reluctant sale of a much loved van in excellent condition throughout. Rare walkthrough model, mango green with dove grey over. Fully and professionally sorted inside, outside and mechanically and ready to provide hours of enjoyment and family camping. You will not find better.



Mechanically
Nearly new SSP 1641cc engine with all new tinware and ancillaries
Twin Weber 34 ICT’s
New alternator
Petronix electronic ignition (not yet fitted)
Bugpack ceramic header on working heat exchangers
VW speedshop stainless steel quiet pack exhaust
IRS rear end running 1300 beetle box
Creative adjustable spring plates
PUMA 2” narrowed adjustable front beam (18 months old)
King and link pins replaced only 6 months ago
SPAX gas adjustable shocks
CSP front disc brakes on dual circuit cylinder
Creative Engineering rack and pinion steering conversion
Split charging system with intelligent self switching relay and full override protection and leisure battery


Exterior
Dove grey over mango green
Bullet indicators
Single rear lenses
Polished Empi 5 spokes with 185/65/15 at rear and 185/55/15 at front
Aluminium sun visor
US spec towel rail bumpers front and rear
Aluminium side step
Karmon Konnection 3 bow period roof rack
New windscreens and seals 6 months ago


Interior
Full CCR (Vaughan Green/Tim Hartley) interior
One off interior designed for practical camping - featured in VW Camper Inspirational Interiors by David Eccles – page 88
Brand new full headlining
Cream leather seats with green piping
Rock and roll bed
Buddy seat with side seat (to seat 4)
Removal table
Oak cabinets with cream melamine facings
Lift up cooking compartment
Removable Waeco 3-way fridge (12v, 240v, gas) – shelves for resulting space included.
Large double cupboard, single cupboard and cutlery drawer
Large storage chest with removable sliding boxes
Overhead locker with storage for table
Rear split level wardrobe
Rear side cupboard
Further cupboard behind passenger seat proving storage for table leg, shelves for fridge space and lift up storage box.
Adjustable spot lights
Front cab bunk
Full set of VW Curtains
4 no. 12v sockets



Cab
Uncut dashboard
CSP bus shifter with reverse lock out
Autogage 3 ¼ ” tacho
12v socket


ICE
Sony CDX7500 head unit - Radio & mp3 compatible CD with removable faceplate
Infinity 2-way 6 x 9” rear speakers mounted in rear seat kickboard
JBL 4” front speakers
Fusion amplifier mounted under rear seat
Fusion 12” sub mounted in rear overhead locker
Alpine 10” flip down DVD player mounted in roof and connected to sound system

Accessories
Outdoor Revolution Navigator drive away awning with groundsheet, 2 man inner tent and full set of storm straps
Just Kampers 4 place camping set – plates, cups, bowls etc and full cutlery set
Full set of Just Kampers thermo mats
Fiamma levelling chocks



Price - £18,750 ono. Call Jim on 07721 389 902

You got a PM but it still apears in my outbox and not in sent box?!? So please give me a mail to sloew "ad" arcor.de
I am interested in you bus.
Stefan

I can't believe you're selling your beautiful van Jim, best of luck.

Chris T (spindles)
Nice bus, good luck.

Hi mate,

Is it still for sale?

cheers
gorgeous bus good luck with the sale

Sorry guys - she's now sold

thanks to all who rang and showed an interest
